content.question: If <math alttext="the sine of open parenthesis, x plus y, close parenthesis, equals, 3 x, minus 2 y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 minus, the cosine of open parenthesis, x plus y, close parenthesis, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1 minus, the cosine of open parenthesis, x plus y, close parenthesis, and denominator the cosine of open parenthesis, x plus y, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3, and denominator 2 plus, the cosine of open parenthesis, x plus y, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 minus, the cosine of open parenthesis, x plus y, close parenthesis, and denominator 2 plus, the cosine of open parenthesis, x plus y, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 minus, the cosine of open parenthesis, x plus y, close parenthesis, and denominator 2 plus, the cosine of open parenthesis, x plus y, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
